summary:
Developing applications for civil service organizations can be uniquely
challenging. The presentation discusses our experience with MASS a
market surveillance and monitoring application developed for the TTSEC.
MASS is based on Django and Pandas. We highlight not only the techinal
aspects of the solution but also address the HR and organizational
factors that impacted on the project

Help us caption & translate this video!

http://amara.org/v/FOP3/
title: REGULATING THE SECURITIES MARKET WITH DJANGO AND PANDAS
